N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 297.5 - User responsibilities

State Regulations
(a) Each user shall be responsible for compliance with the area security
requirements outlined in the FCC rules and regulations and for the general
tidiness of the area in which the equipment is installed. Access to the area
will be controlled by designated Office of General Services personnel. No keys
shall be issued to user personnel or maintenance contractors. (b) Each user shall be responsible for full
compliance with the FCC rules and regulations governing the licensing, operation and maintenance of the installed equipment. No installation of the
equipment shall commence unless and until a copy of the FCC license has been
received by the Commissioner of General Services. (The foregoing requirement
shall not apply to Federal agencies.) Citations for noncompliance with FCC
rules and regulations will result in removal of power from the user's equipment
until the deficiency has been corrected. A copy of the license shall be posted
by the user in the equipment room upon completion of the
installation. (c) Each user will be
required to sign an agreement containing the specific rules governing his
installation. The agreement shall contain a clause reserving the right of the

Office of General Services to request relocation of the user's equipment, at
user's expense, to another location within the building or to another building
in order to accommodate additional systems. Failure to comply within a
reasonable time with a request to relocate shall result in removal of power
from the user's equipment. Notes
